subtitle: This light and fruity whip that uses fresh mango, stem ginger and double cream.

method.text: Peel and cut as much flesh from each mango as possible. Place in a food processor or blender with the stem ginger and ginger syrup. Process until very smooth and well mixed.
In a clean bowl, lightly whip the cream with the vanilla and brandy, until it stands in soft peaks. Gently fold the cream into the mango puree. Spoon into serving glasses. Chill for 1 hour.

title: Mango and ginger whip
